TopicTitle: Antenna Strength sliders in Settings not working?

Articles.Content:
There are antenna strength sliders that can be accessed in the in-save Settings menu (not the big settings menu from outside a save game) but they don't seem to do anything. There are two sliders 1) Range Modifier and 2) DSN modifier. Adjusting either of these sliders doesn't change the Antenna strength or range information when I right-click on any antennas.

Have others seen this?
But does it work in practice? In other words, can you find a difference in the distance your spacecraft are able to go before they lose connection?

10 hours ago, Streetwind said:

But does it work in practice? In other words, can you find a difference in the distance your spacecraft are able to go before they lose connection?

Hmm...I haven't yet tested it. I guess it's silly of me to assume that the in-game readouts were accurate
